projects.name: Twitter - Social Media Platform
outcomes: Developed a full-featured Twitter clone with the MERN stack, including user authentication and real-time updates.
Implemented RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js for efficient handling of user data, posts, likes, and comments.
Developed front-end components using React, ensuring a dynamic and interactive user experience.

projects.name: AI RUDRA - ChatBot
outcomes: Built a React JS AI chatBot which can Response to our Prompt.
It has Capable of Writing Code and Fixing Error Code.
It Fetch the Response from Gemini-Pro.

projects.name: Fake News Detection
outcomes: Developed a Machine Learning model using Python, Pandas, and Sklearn to achieve X% accuracy in fake news detection.
Cleaned and preprocessed the dataset using Python and Pandas, transforming it into a well-structured and ready-to-train dataset for the fake news detection models.
Implemented advanced data processing techniques to handle missing data, imbalanced classes, and text normalization, improving the model's predictive power.
